alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Toombs, southeastern Telfair, southeastern Wheeler and southern Montgomery Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Towns to near Jordan to near Toombs Central, and moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lumber City, Uvalda, Scotland, Alston, Towns, Toombs Central, Spring Hill, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Grays Landing, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing, Jordan, Charlotteville and Johnson Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
